project.name: J4SQL Common libraries
project.description:
J4SQL is a set of tools that enables a platform independent way of writing and deploying SQL Stored Procedures, Functions and Triggers using Java(TM).
J4SQL uses J2SE 5.0 annotations or Doclets to define how Java methods should be exposed in SQL DDL and will provide generators for the most commonly used SQL databases. A plugin architecture makes it possible to extend the set of DDL generators to include new flavors.
J4SQL is Free Software licensed under a BSD-style license that allows it to be used in commercial or other open source projects.
